name: Three Dots & a Dash

ingredients.item: maraschino cherries on a cocktail pick and 1 pineapple frond (representing Morse Code—three cherries as the three dots and the frond as the dash), for garnish

preparation:
This Tiki drink is what an exotic cocktail is all about, with citrus, sweeteners, spice and, of course, rums.

Add all of the ingredients to a drink mixer tin.

Fill with 12 oz of crushed ice and 4 to 6 small “agitator” cubes.

Flash-blend, then open pour with gated finish into a footed pilsner glass and add the garnish.
